医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超过 80% 的女性在妊娠晚期缺铁孕妇普遍缺铁，影响健康结果。这项研究强调了怀孕期间监测和营养的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Over-8025-of-women-are-iron-deficient-by-their-third-trimester.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Over-8025-of-women-are-iron-deficient-by-their-third-trimester.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80fbbea3-736e-4e9a-9152-7dd124eacbc7 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 05:55:00 -0400 Over 80% of women are iron deficient by their third trimester
食用富含类黄酮的食物与中年成年人患 NAFLD 的风险降低相关研究表明，高黄酮类化合物摄入量与降低 NAFLD 风险有关，苹果和茶对肝脏健康具有显着的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/The-conspiration-of-flavonoid-rich-foods-was-linked-with-a-reduced-risk-of-NAFLD-among-middle-aged-成人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/The-conspiration-of-flavonoid-rich-foods-was-linked-with-a-reduced-risk-of-NAFLD-among-middle-aged-成人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=269588c5-04b3-4668-bc49-7bc433991f6f Mon, 30 Sep 2024 05:49:00 -0400 The consumption of flavonoid-rich foods was associated with a reduced risk of NAFLD among middle-aged adults
Owlstone Medical 推出呼吸活检 VOC Atlas®，以解锁人类呼吸中的疾病生物标志物呼吸活检 VOC 图谱提供了挥发性有机化合物的全面目录，增强了对健康和疾病中呼吸生物标志物的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Owlstone-Medical-launches-Breath-Biopsy-VOC-Atlasc2ae-to-unlock-disease-biomarkers-in- human-breath.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Owlstone-Medical-launches-Breath-Biopsy-VOC-Atlasc2ae-to-unlock-disease-biomarkers-in- human-breath.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55c5adae-b0ab-4c3a-9f9b-19c52866db2f Mon, 30 Sep 2024 05:20:00 -0400 Owlstone Medical launches Breath Biopsy VOC Atlas® to unlock disease biomarkers in human breath
Biocartis 任命著名精准肿瘤学专家 W. Michael Korn 博士为首席医疗和科学官Biocartis 欢迎 W. Michael Korn 博士担任首席医疗和科学官，利用他的肿瘤学专业知识来加强癌症的分子检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Biocartis-appoints-renowned- precision-oncology-expert-Dr-W-Michael-Korn-as-Chief-Medical-and-Scientific-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Biocartis-appoints-renowned- precision-oncology-expert-Dr-W-Michael-Korn-as-Chief-Medical-and-Scientific-Officer.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f581e7a-6fff-438f-aeac-097a22987467 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 04:55:00 -0400 Biocartis appoints renowned precision oncology expert, Dr. W. Michael Korn, as Chief Medical and Scientific Officer
研究人员发现了一种可以为 T 细胞充电以实现持久癌症缓解的蛋白质研究表明，Fc-IL-4 可以使耗尽的 CD8+ T 细胞恢复活力，增强抗肿瘤反应，并凸显结合 1 型和 2 型免疫的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Researchers-identify-a- Protein-that-recharges-T-cells-for-long-having-cancer-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Researchers-identify-a- Protein-that-recharges-T-cells-for-long-having-cancer-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ec2606a-0fc1-4ed1-bc3e-6834e5ea35ee Mon, 30 Sep 2024 04:35:00 -0400 Researchers identify a protein that recharges T cells for long-lasting cancer remission
研究揭示了血浆蛋白的生物驱动因素，为疾病生物标志物和药物发现提供了新见解研究人员绘制了对 4,775 种血浆蛋白的生物学影响，揭示了可改变和不可改变因素的相互作用，对疾病生物标志物和药物靶标具有重要影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Study-uncovers-biological-drivers-of-plasma- Proteins-offering-new-insights-for-disease-biomarkers-and-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Study-uncovers-biological-drivers-of-plasma- Proteins-offering-new-insights-for-disease-biomarkers-and-drug-discovery.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9077494f-3288-49c3-9a14-6756a85e4cb6 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 00:52:00 -0400 Study uncovers biological drivers of plasma proteins, offering new insights for disease biomarkers and drug discovery
并非所有的超加工食品都是一样的：研究人员警告不要破坏整个食品类别研究人员发现，食用超加工食品（UPF）可能不会直接导致不良的健康结果，生活方式因素起着重要作用。需要更多的实验研究来确定因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Not-all-ultra-processed-foods-are-made-alike-Researchers-warn-against-villainizing-entire-food-group.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Not-all-ultra-processed-foods-are-made-alike-Researchers-warn-against-villainizing-entire-food-group.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff957ca5-6841-4139-8cfc-41d3d7f02d0c Mon, 30 Sep 2024 00:17:00 -0400 Not all ultra-processed foods are made alike: Researchers warn against villainizing entire food group
病毒持续存在和免疫功能障碍如何导致新冠病毒长期存在研究探索了长期新冠病毒的生物驱动因素和机制，揭示了其流行病学和潜在的治疗干预措施。它强调了病毒持续存在、免疫功能障碍和凝血在这种疾病发展中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/How-viral-persistence-and-immune-dysfunction-drive-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/How-viral-persistence-and-immune-dysfunction-drive-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18cc4516-8d21-444f-afae-17c9ae334fb3 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 23:52:00 -0400 How viral persistence and immune dysfunction drive long COVID
III 期试验表明脑转移治疗中存在可逆的认知副作用根据三项大型 III 期临床试验的汇总分析，大量在放射治疗后出现认知副作用的脑转移患者可能会完全恢复认知功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Phase-III-trials-indicate-reversible-cognitive-side-effects-in-brain-metastases-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Phase-III-trials-indicate-reversible-cognitive-side-effects-in-brain-metastases-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f51cb97c-c762-4528-8522-f38e22108600 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:44:39 -0400 Phase III trials indicate reversible cognitive side effects in brain metastases treatment
通过创新的放射性药物治疗延长脑膜瘤患者的生存期一种放射性药物疗法已成功延长了神经内分泌肿瘤患者的无进展生存期，该疗法有望为难以治疗的脑膜瘤（一种脑肿瘤）患者带来类似的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Extending-survival-in-meningioma-患者-with-innovative-radiopharmaceutical-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240929/Extending-survival-in-meningioma-患者-with-innovative-radiopharmaceutical-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2072aa0-c2dc-42f9-b468-b7e6166c0566 Sun, 29 Sep 2024 22:38:27 -0400 Extending survival in meningioma patients with innovative radiopharmaceutical therapy
